com.noctarius.tengi.spi.pooling

Interface ObjectHandler<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the pooled object

    public interface ObjectHandler<T>

    The ObjectHandler interface describes the object factory as well as a system to add additional logic on acquisition or release of an object.

    Additional logic can range from simple state preparation and cleanup to complex resource allocation or de-allocation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void activateObject(T object)
      Handles activation process for a pre-allocated object.
      T create()
      Returns a new instance of the object type.
      default void destroy(T object)
      Destroys the given pooled object instance.
      default void passivateObject(T object)
      Handled deactivation process for a pre-allocated object.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        T create()
        Returns a new instance of the object type. This is a typical factory method and is called by the ObjectPool on creation to pre-allocate object instances or whenever an object instance is invalid and a new instance has to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the new object instance

      • destroy

        default void destroy(T object)
        Destroys the given pooled object instance. This method is used to free any kind of external resource before leaving the object itself to the Garbage Collector to be collected.
        Parameters:
        object - the object instance to destroy

      • activateObject

        default void activateObject(T object)
        Handles activation process for a pre-allocated object. The object might allocate additional resources or setup / clean internal state.
        Parameters:
        object - the pooled object instance to activate

      • passivateObject

        default void passivateObject(T object)
        Handled deactivation process for a pre-allocated object. The object must de-allocate any previously allocated resource (activateObject(Object) and might cleanup internal state.
        Parameters:
        object - the pooled object instance to passivate
